text: Reminder: What cool things have you been working on? show it off we love to see everyone’s cool and creative work. If it’s a site built on HubSpot consider also posting to the <https://designers.HubSpot.com/inspire|Inspire gallery>.

Hey all,

A few weeks ago <@U087GKEQWMC> complained about not being able to easily find internal values for default HubSpot properties, and I completely agree with that. So I put together a simple page that has all the default properties for contacts, companies, deals and tickets. You can see the name, internal name, type and description. Also you can copy the internal names because that is what we need in most cases.

Let me know if I should add anything else that can be useful or if anything is missing/wrong.

<https://hs-default-properties.replit.app/>
Wow, this is amazing, thanks for putting in the work for this! Much appreciated!
